name: Order of Dagon
startIntroPart1: The truth lies. The delusions the people believed, the old world, the 'stable' world, where did that bring us? What did they really know? The old government protected them? Failed to protect? No, it was planned. They wanted this. They needed this. Where do you think the politicians went? Dead? Killed in the downfall? No, they hid like cowards. How many COG sites are still up? How many are still alive?
startIntroPart2:
They lied, while good people died, they lived, they must die.
We are secretive, we are alone, we must allow no one to find us.
We can trust no one, we can speak to no one, we can join no one.
Dagon guides us now, he will help us seek our goal. No matter the cost.
attacked: Our wraith is now upon you.
defeated: This has only delayed the inevitable.
uniques: Triggers a [COG site found!] event <upon turn end> <with [15]% chance> <hidden from users> <if [Radio Station] is constructed>
Triggers a [A Forbidden Knowledge.] event <upon turn end> <with [5]% chance>  <if [Church of Starry Wisdom] is constructed> <without [Necronomicon]> <hidden from users>
